--- layout: apidoc title: Tile5 API Documentation ---

T5.Style

Methods

define()

The define method can be used in two ways. Firstly, you can use the method to define a single new style:

js var styleId = T5.Style.define('new-style', { fill: '#FF0000', opacity: 0.8 });

Additionally, instead of passing through a single style definition you can pass through multiple definitions in a single hit:

```js T5.Style.define({ blueStyle: { fill: '#0000FF' }, greenStyle: { fill: '#00FF00' } });

each(callback)

get(id)
